description:
SONICC computes density and velocity transfer functions for use in the initial conditions of 
massive neutrino
cosmological simulations. The transfer functions are backscaled using a scale-dependent growth 
function that produces self-consistent evolution for all three matter species (cold dark matter, 
baryons, massive neutrinos) in the Newtonian forward model of cosmological simulations.
name: sf-23-021 SONICC (SCALE-DEPENDENT OMEGA FOR NEUTRINO INITIAL CONDITION CODES)
